Package org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Class EBDD

java.lang.Object
jdd.bdd.NodeTable
jdd.bdd.BDD
org.svvrl.goal.core.util.EBDD
Direct Known Subclasses:
LTLBDD, PLBDD
public class EBDD
extends jdd.bdd.BDD
This class provides some more methods for BDD operations.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
